EmailTemplate.name: Port_Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Re: {!Case.Subject} -- Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We have submitted the port request for the following number(s):
Rogers Temporary Number: XXX-XXX-XXXX
Port-in Number: XXX-XXX-XXXX
Please see some useful information below for your records, should you need to distribute to end users:
-The port-in number must remain active during the port-in process.
-It is the responsibility of the client to be aware of any applicable cancellation fees associated their old service provider.
-If your number is not ported in within 24 hours please contact us
Wireless to Wireless: It usually takes about 2.5 hours to complete the port in, but it could take up to a week depending on the complexity of the transfer and your OSP. Landline to Wireless: It usually takes about 2 days to complete the port in request (not including weekends and statutory holidays), but it could take up to a week depending on the complexity of the transfer and your OSP.
-Once complete, the user will receive notification via text message
-Please note that a non-Rogers device must be unlocked to be compatible with our network
Thank you, and should you have any additional inquiries please feel free to contact us.
{!Case.Thread_Id}
